Comments_List: I gained a broad knowledge of social transformations in Europe and the U.S. in 1968 and the surrounding years. I also gained a basic understanding of the historiography surrounding those events, as well as the analytical frameworks generally applied to them.

The strengths of the course were also its weaknesses - having such direct engagement with the Beinecke's collections was terrific; however, it did limit the scope of the course to a fairly white and Eurocentric narrative.
